data.title: Tombigbee Electric Cooperative
data.meta_description: There are many ways to contact Tombigbee when you have outages. View this page to see how to report your outages so we can get your power restored ASAP!
data.text:
REPORT AN OUTAGE ONLINE VIEW CURRENT OUTAGES

Outage Reporting Tips

Phone

The most effective way to report an outage is to call our dedicated outage number: 205-498-8070.

Please have your account number ready just in case your phone number hasn't been updated.

Please note: during a widespread or prolonged outage, the phone lines may become congested and reporting online may be a better option.

Online

Click on the Report an Outage link above to log in to our customer service portal to report your outage. You can also click on the View Current Outages link above to see how many members are currently without power and where the outages are located.

Another option is to report your outage from our FREE App. Click on the appropriate link below to download the app.

Facebook

Outage information and restoration updates are available on our Facebook page.

Facebook is updated by our staff and information is provided when available.
